overview: Olivia may have felt no need to change, but the world around her was not bound by such an impractical sentiment. Oliviaâ€™s Place is gone. The site where it used to stand is now a sort of plaza between two large old wood frame houses that were moved to their present location from elsewhere in the city. One of these houses is occupied by a restaurant, the other is occupied by the California Heritage Museum. (Morgan Fisher)  Preserved by the Academy Film Archive in 2008.
title: Olivia's Place
